intro: Psychotria rupestris, commonly known as the rock psychotria, is a species of flowering plant in the Rubiaceae family. It is native to tropical regions of South America, particularly Brazil, Colombia, and Ecuador. The plant is characterized by its small, dark green leaves and clusters of white or pale yellow flowers. It often grows on rocky outcrops or in shaded, moist environments. Psychotria rupestris is sometimes cultivated for its ornamental value due to its attractive foliage and unique floral display.
